.. _install_download:

===========
Download
===========

The Minds project repository contains multiple submodule repositories:

* /minds

  * /front
  * /engine
  * /sockets

To download and setup Minds via git:

1. run ``git clone https://github.com/minds/minds.git``
2. run ``init.sh`` (or ``init.bat`` on Windows) to clone submodule repositories
